props.name: buttons
props.description: Additional inline buttons in the item's footer

props.name: image
props.description: Item image settings. See `k-image-frame` for available settings.

props.name: info
props.description: The optional info text that will be show next or below the main text

props.name: sortable
props.description: If `true`, the sort handle will be shown on hover

props.name: target
props.description: Sets a target attribute if a link is also set

props.name: text
props.description: The main text for the item

props.name: width
props.description: The width (e.g. `"1/2"`) of the parent column is used to set the srcset sizes accordingly
